name: tnyOS
tagline: A fun hobby OS that doesn't crash... Often.
body:
tnyOS- A fun hobby OS that doesn't crash... Often
tnyOs is a very basic kernel (not really and OS yet) that has minimal code that is easy to digest. I suggest reading this code along with guides such as _The Little Book about OS Development._

***

TODO:

* interrupt handler
* basic input functions
* system calls
* shell
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
